title: Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (2 reds, black, purple and brown) and dye (yellow) applied by brush or pen. Blue brushed over resist (chintz).
description: Diamond lattice enclosing floral forms. Horizontal line at bottom. Faint pencil line at right where fabric was cut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (2 reds, black, purple and brown) and dye (yellow) applied by brush or pen. Blue brushed over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-71.
